Message Dr S. Sambhu Prasad, Professor & Principal At NSRIT, we strongly believe that the core of technical and managerial education lies in empowering students with practical skills, critical thinking, and values-driven leadership. In a fast-evolving world driven by innovation and global competition, it is no longer sufficient to impart knowledge alone. We must shape individuals who can think independently, innovate I responsibly, and lead ethically. Our institution is committed to this vision by offering an environment of academic excellence, experiential learning, and holistic development. With a well-qualified faculty team, state-of the-art infrastructure, and industry-aligned curriculum, we ensure that students are not only equipped with theoretical foundations but are also trained to face real-time challenges with confidence and competence. We focus on creating vibrant learning communities where students are encouraged to explore interdisciplinary knowledge, engage in cutting-edge research, and participate in innovation driven activities like startups, design thinking, and entrepreneurship. Our numerous initiatives in collaboration with industries and research agencies provide students with hands-on exposure to the technologies of tomorrow—be it Artificial Intelligence, Communications, Electrical vehicle Technology, Digital Manufacturing, Robotics, and other Industry 4.0 Technologies. The NSRIT campus is more than just a place to study—it is a launchpad for young minds to transform into global professionals, responsible citizens, and future change-makers. We take pride in instilling the values of discipline, service, and integrity in our graduates while ensuring they are competitive in both national and international landscapes. In today’s dynamic world, where technological revolutions are reshaping every sector, our mission is to create graduates who do not just adapt to change, but drive it. The blend of modern learning platforms, rigorous academic programs, vibrant co-curricular engagements, and strong mentorship helps us realize this mission consistently. With the collaborative efforts of our dedicated faculty, staff, students, stakeholders, and under the Vision and guidance of Management, NSRIT continues to move forward with purpose and passion—striving to be a center of excellence in engineering education and research. Let us march ahead together, with innovation in our minds and service in our hearts. “Education is not just about learning facts, but about training minds to think, innovate, and lead with compassion.” Warm Regards Dr S. Sambhu Prasad, Professor & Principal, NSRIT To Know More About Principal’s Profile ×
